name: Flicklash
description:
"As a game that you can easily pickup and play with little skill, Flicklash has the potential to be a good time killer." - AppAdvice.com

Flicklash is an addictive arcade game in which you control a cursor using a simple pull and release mechanic.

The quicker you collect the coins, the more points you score.

Rules:
1. Collect shiny coins
2. Avoid spinning gears of doom
